changes: Add ability to open more than one plug-in UI — you can finally have multiple plug-in windows laying around while playing. Very useful for live performances;
improved floating legends in Action Editor — we added some cute floating legends that stick on top of each Action Editor widget, making it easier to edit actions in the right place;
huge optimizations to the audio rendering process;
Windows: store configuration file in AppData directory — to allow better integration with the environment;
Windows: fix missing .dll file on startup;
many more usability improvements and smaller optimizations.
